articles.title: Goldman Sachs Forecasts AT&T (T) Buyback Ramp-Up Fueled by 8% Free Cash Flow Growth
articles.mainIdea: Goldman Sachs Forecasts AT&T (T) Buyback Ramp-Up Fueled by 8% Free Cash Flow Growth
articles.summary: Insider Monkey: Goldman Sachs Forecasts AT&T (T) Buyback Ramp-Up Fueled by 8% Free Cash Flow Growth. AT&T Inc. (NYSE:T) is one of the best high volume stocks to buy right now. On December 19, Goldman Sachs lowered the firm’s price target on AT&T to $29 from $33 while maintaining a Buy rating on the shares. The firm expects AT&T to ramp up share repurchases as its free cash flow grows at […] Related tickers mentioned: LUMN, T-PA.

articles.summary: Zacks: Will Kodiak Collaboration Strengthen Verizon's Growth Prospects?. VZ teams up with Kodiak AI to bring 5G and IoT to autonomous trucks, enabling safer, smarter, and more connected freight operations. Related tickers mentioned: T-PA, VZ.

articles.title: Will Partnership With Sovato Boost T's Prospects in Digital Health?

articles.summary: Zacks: Will Partnership With Sovato Boost T's Prospects in Digital Health?. AT&T teams up with Sovato to expand digital healthcare access, combining 5G and cloud tools for virtual care in remote areas. Related tickers mentioned: T-PA, VZ.
